name: Course on GOC: Acids, Bases, and ABR (Basic to Advance)
description: Mohammad Kashif Alam will cover the topics of acids, bases, and ABR. All the topics will be discussed in detail and will be helpful for all aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. The course is for 1 month approximately with 12 sessions and the duration of each session is 90 minutes. The session will be taught in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Acidity : Basic Definitions, Factors, pKa Value, and Acids in Solutions
Concepts of Acids & their Conjugate Base
Acidity of Hydrocarbons and Relations between Structure & Acidity
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing
Acidity of Phenols, EWG, and ERG Effects
Acidity of Carboxylic Acids in Detail
Basicity: Basic Definitions, Factors, and pKb Value
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing
Basicity of Anilines, Amidines, and Guanidine
How to Predict Outcome of a Acid Base Reaction and HSAB Principle
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing

author.bio: A Star faculty of IIT JEE with 11 Best Teaching Awards, Mohammad sir has been an exceptional coach to 6000 AIRs in the last 10+ years.
